name: Korean Hanryu Tour
description:
The tourist information center in Gangnam, which became famous by PSY ’s "Gangnam style", gives you various information of the Korean wave. There are some incidence where you could run into Korean pop stars and have a chance to take photos and get some souvenirs in the mini set of the Korean wave experience center. 

You can experience digital contents through using the newest electronics and shop the most developed IT products and accessories.

Detailed Explanations about Korean history is very important to understand the true meaning of touring cultural heritages.

Namdaemun Market shows life of Korean, and Insadong have hundreds of traditional souvenirs. And there is also a rare chance to meet different tourists from all around the world. Take the whole package of perfect Seoul tour!
